entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is mentioned as 'Harry' throughout the text.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: A person who is part of Harry's group. She is mentioned as giving instructions to Ginny and warning the twins not to go down Knockturn Alley.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Mrs Weasley's daughter, who is part of Harry's group. She is mentioned as going off with Mrs Weasley at the beginning of the text.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends. He is mentioned as strolling off along the street with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends. She is mentioned as dragging Ron away from a shop window to buy ink and parchment next door.

entities.name: knockturn alley
entities.description: A street in the wizarding world where shops are located. It is mentioned as being off-limits by Mrs Weasley.

entities.name: chudley cannon robes
entities.description: A set of Quidditch robes that Ron longingly looks at in a shop window.

entities.name: quality quidditch supplies
entities.description: A store where Harry, Ron, and Hermione go to buy things. It is mentioned as having Chudley Cannon robes in the window.

entities.name: gambol and japes wizarding joke shop
entities.description: A store where Harry, Ron, and Hermione meet Fred, George, and Lee Jordan. It is mentioned as selling 'Dr Filibuster's Fabulous Wet-Start, No-Heat Fireworks'.

entities.name: dr filibuster's fabulous wet-start, no-heat fireworks
entities.description: A type of firework that Fred, George, and Lee Jordan are stocking up on in Gambol and Japes Wizarding Joke Shop.

entities.name: fred jordan
entities.description: One of the twins who is part of Harry's group. He is mentioned as being in Gambol and Japes Wizarding Joke Shop with his brother George.

entities.name: george jordan
entities.description: One of the twins who is part of Harry's group. He is mentioned as being in Gambol and Japes Wizarding Joke Shop with his brother Fred.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: A person who is part of Harry's group. He is mentioned as being in Gambol and Japes Wizarding Joke Shop with the twins.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is associated with Mrs Weasley, as they are both part of the same group and she gives instructions to him at the beginning of the text.
Harry Potter is associated with Ginny, as they are both part of the same group and she goes off with Mrs Weasley at the beginning of the text.
Harry Potter is associated with Ron, as they are both part of the same group and strolling off along the street together at the beginning of the text.
Harry Potter is associated with Hermione, as they are both part of the same group and strolling off along the street together at the beginning of the text.
Ron is associated with Harry Potter, as they are both part of the same group and strolling off along the street together at the beginning of the text.
Ron is associated with Hermione, as they are both part of the same group and strolling off along the street together at the beginning of the text.
Hermione is associated with Harry Potter, as they are both part of the same group and strolling off along the street together at the beginning of the text.
Hermione is associated with Ron, as they are both part of the same group and strolling off along the street together at the beginning of the text.
